short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to play on Language Squad with only a keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choices gets bound to numbers (1-10 [0=10]) on your keyboard, then qwerty layout (q=11, w=12, etc.). Also allow to press enter to Start or Go to next level.
